summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Fractal Alert System v2.1.1 - All backend API endpoints working correctly, frontend admin alerts tab functional, alert notifications properly respect FRACTAL_ALERTS_ENABLED=false setting

configuration_notes.note: FRACTAL_ALERTS_ENABLED=false in .env - test alerts fail with telegram error as expected
configuration_notes.impact: Expected behavior - alerts disabled in test environment

passed_tests: GET /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/alerts/quota - returns correct quota with max: 3
POST /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/alerts/check - dry run returns ok: true, dryRun: true
POST /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/alerts/test - test alert fails with telegram error when FRACTAL_ALERTS_ENABLED=false
GET /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/overview - shows governance mode NORMAL and freeze status
Frontend Admin Alerts tab loads correctly with all expected UI components
Alert quota display shows 0/3 with 3 remaining
Alert statistics display shows last 24h and 7d counts
Alert history table shows 'No alerts found' (expected)
Filter dropdowns for Level, Type, Status are present
Send Test Alert button is clickable and functional
Test alert properly fails when alerts are disabled

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All alert API endpoints working correctly
